overview: Count Ubaldo desires to make an unfavorable alliance with the Spanish armies. When Riccardo refuses to go along with the plans, he is ambushed in the forest and left for dead. However, he returns with a vengeance, organizes a band of marauders, and begins to pick away at Ubaldoâ€™s forces. But Ubaldo kidnaps Laura, and Riccardo must storm the castle to free her.
title: The Mysterious Swordsman
